alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Western Alachua (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 6:07PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Bradford and northern Alachua Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 607 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near High Springs to near Sampson. Movement was northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph, half inch hail, and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Alachua, High Springs, Sampson, Hampton, La Crosse and Brooker. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
